summary: The module defines a specialized variational autoencoder decoder designed for DALL‑E 3. It converts latent tensors into images, supporting tiled decoding, slice‑wise control, customizable attention mechanisms, and blending strategies. It also provides a container for the encoder’s Gaussian distribution output, enabling sampling of latent vectors for downstream decoding.
business_intent: Enable high‑quality image generation from latent representations within generative AI workflows, offering flexible decoding options (tiling, attention customization, blending) to improve scalability and visual fidelity for DALL‑E 3 and similar models.
